name: @raydeck/ddb-manager
description: Base class for managing DynamoDB model
author: Ray Deck

scripts.docs: typedoc --theme markdown --readme none --mode file --stripInternal --excludeNotExported --includeVersion --out docstemp && rm README.md ; concat-md docstemp > README.md && rm -rf docstemp
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn build && yarn docs && git commit README.md -m "docs: updating docs" && git push
